member.name: NMSELCHANGE
member.summary: Carries information required to process the MCN_SELCHANGE notification code.

member.name: NMSELCHANGE.nmhdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about this notification.

member.name: NMSELCHANGE.stSelStart
member.summary: structure that contains the date for the first day in the user's selection range.

member.name: NMSELCHANGE.stSelEnd
member.summary: structure that contains the date for the last day in the user's selection range.
